title: Floral Emerald, Ruby & Pearl Jhumkas - A Touch of Hyderabadi Elegance
features: Exquisite floral design featuring a cluster of emeralds at the top, followed by delicate floral motifs of rubies and diamonds. The Jhumka is further enhanced with lustrous freshwater pearls and is finished with a drop of emerald. The setting showcases intricate craftsmanship with a focus on showcasing the gemstones' natural beauty.
colors: The piece features a vibrant color palette of green (emeralds)
and the warm golden hue of the gold setting. The diamonds add a sparkling contrast.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
and even modern cocktail parties. A versatile piece that complements both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: This Jhumka features a contemporary design while incorporating the richness of traditional South Indian jewelry elements. The high-quality emeralds, rubies, and pearls, combined with the brilliance of the diamonds, create a truly luxurious piece. The unique floral motif and Hyderabadi craftsmanship makes it a collectible item.
